keyMoments.title: Whitebeard's Final Order
keyMoments.description: Captain Whitebeard gives his final order to the crew - a full evacuation from Marineford while he covers their retreat.
keyMoments.significance: Whitebeard's last command as captain of the Whitebeard Pirates, demonstrating his protective nature toward his crew.

keyMoments.title: Loss of 2nd Division Commander
keyMoments.description: Ace, the 2nd Division Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates, takes a fatal blow while protecting Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: The Whitebeard Pirates lose one of their most powerful division commanders, a devastating blow to the crew.
